text: An Unmarried Woman is a 1978 American comedy drama movie directed and written by Paul Mazursky. It stars Jill Clayburgh, Alan Bates, Michael Murphy, Cliff Gorman and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. It was nominated for three Oscars in 1979. ==Other websites== * Category:1978 comedy-drama movies Category:1978 romantic comedy movies Category:1978 romantic drama movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:Movies directed by Paul Mazursky Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies set in New York City
title: An Unmarried Woman
